alert.note: Alert for Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 11:50PM MST until December 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will reduce visibility to under 2 miles at times. Drifting snow will make travel on rural roads difficult. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution. Check road conditions before travel. Call 511 for road reports. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency
